item.title: iPad Jones. Iâ€™ve Got An iPad Jones
item.description:
I’ve been interested in e-book readers since the Amazon Kindle was released. The idea of carrying many books conveniently is appealing. Even better is the ability to enlarge the font size for reading without glasses. Plus, not needing shelf space for dusty books is a definite advantage. However, I haven’t purchased one because I don’t read books constantly anymore. The interactive nature of the internet holds my attention more effectively. An e-book reader combined with an internet-capable computer would be amazing!..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ipad-jones-i-ve-got-an-ipad-jones/
